item.title: 可能冲破印尼男孩俱乐部的女人
item.description:
在东南亚最大的经济体中，政治往往是男性主导的家族事务。改变可能来自东爪哇。【原文：

Politics is often a male-dominated family affair in Southeast Asia’s largest economy. Change may come from East Java.

item.title: SpaceX 获得 "星链 "小区覆盖的有条件批准
item.description: 监管机构已经批准了SpaceX公司的部分计划，即利用其Starlink卫星对T-Mobile美国公司的蜂窝网络进行补充，从而扩大埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的公司的通信能力，以覆盖更多客户。【原文：Regulators have green-lit some of SpaceX’s plans to supplement T-Mobile US Inc.’s cellular network using its Starlink satellites, expanding the Elon Musk-led company’s communications capabilities in a bid to reach more customers.】

item.title: 特朗普关税是美国木材面临的最新通胀压力
item.description: 最近几个月，由于加拿大产量下降，美国木材价格已经上涨，在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提议对边境以北的贸易征收关税后，美国木材价格可能会进一步上涨。【原文：US lumber prices, which already have risen in recent months due to lower production in Canada, could see further gains after President-elect Donald Trump’s proposed tariffs on trade from north of the border.】

item.title: 中国快递顺丰控股在香港首次公开募股 7.49 亿美元后开始交易
item.description: 中国顺丰控股有限公司的股票将于本周三在香港上市，预计这将是香港今年对主要上市企业的最后一次考验。【原文：China’s SF Holding Ltd.’s shares are set to debut in Hong Kong on Wednesday, in what is expected to be the city’s final test for major listings this year.】

item.title: 贝莱德支持的新西兰太阳能公司停止运营
item.description: 新西兰贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：SolarZero, a New Zealand company owned by BlackRock Inc. that supports solar panel installations on residential homes, has been placed into liquidation.】

item.title: 德意志银行认为银行股上涨加剧了回购市场压力
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）称，银行股自 9 月底以来的反弹可能会迫使美国最大的机构进一步减少在回购协议或外汇衍生品市场上的活动。【原文：A rally in bank stocks since the end of September could force the largest US institutions to further pull back activity in the market for repurchase agreements or foreign exchange derivatives, according to Deutsche Bank.】

item.title: 美联储官员酝酿逆回购降息以控制基准利率
item.description: 根据美联储的最新会议记录，美联储正再次考虑调整美国中央银行用来帮助控制其主要基准的工具之一。【原文：The Federal Reserve is once again considering a tweak to one of the tools used by the US central bank to help control its main benchmark, according to its latest minutes.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）称，受特朗普关税威胁影响，卢布可能触及大流行病时期的低点
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）表示，如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对来自该国的商品征收 25% 关税的威胁成为现实，加元可能会进一步下跌，但 2025 年下半年可能会为加元带来缓解。【原文：The Canadian dollar could fall further if US President-elect Donald Trump’s threat to put 25% tariffs on goods from the country materializes, CIBC said, but the second half of 2025 will likely provide relief to the loonie.】

item.title: 工会称津巴布韦未能支付国家工作人员的 ZiG 工资
item.description: 11 月，津巴布韦财政部要求削减某些预算项目的开支，但不到两周，津巴布韦就没有向国家工作人员支付 ZiG 部分的工资和奖金。【原文：Zimbabwe failed to pay state workers the ZiG component of their salaries and bonuses in November, less than two weeks after its Treasury requested spending cuts on certain budget items.】

item.title: A16z 正在洽谈牵头 2 亿美元投资黑森林实验室，Grok 上人工智能图像背后的初创公司
item.description: 德国人工智能初创公司黑森林实验室（Black Forest Labs）帮助埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的Grok公司制作图像，在成立不到四个月后，该公司正在与包括安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）在内的投资者洽谈融资事宜，融资额高达2亿美元。【原文：Black Forest Labs, the German artificial intelligence startup that helps Elon Musk’s Grok produce images, is in talks to raise as much as $200 million from investors including Andreessen Horowitz less than four months after it launched.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要显示官员倾向于未来逐步降息
item.description: 根据美联储最近一次政策会议的记录，美联储官员表示广泛支持对未来降息采取谨慎的态度。【原文：Federal Reserve officials indicated broad support for a careful approach to future interest-rate cuts, according to minutes from their latest policy meeting.】

item.title: 汽车保险费用将因特朗普关税而进一步上涨
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对美国的主要贸易伙伴征收新的关税，汽车保险将变得更加昂贵。【原文：Auto insurance is poised to become even more expensive under President-elect Donald Trump’s plan to impose new tariffs on top US trading partners.】

item.title: 古尔斯比称美联储接近中性时放缓缩表是明智之举
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，随着美国央行接近其认为的货币政策中性设定，放缓降息步伐将是 "完全明智的"。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said it would be “perfectly sensible” for the US central bank to slow down the pace of its interest-rate cuts as it approaches what it deems a neutral setting for monetary policy.】

item.title: 特朗普 25% 的关税将推高美国铝和钢的价格
item.description: 花旗集团分析师称，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对来自加拿大和墨西哥的所有商品征收 25% 的关税，这将推高全美的钢铁和铝价格。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump’s plan to impose 25% tariffs on all goods from Canada and Mexico will push up steel and aluminum prices across the US, according to Citigroup analysts.】

item.title: 特朗普的回归迫使摩根大通在新兴市场地方债务上调转方向
item.description: 仅仅用了两个月和一次美国大选，摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：It took just two months — and one US election — for JPMorgan Chase & Co. to make a complete turnaround on its call for emerging-market, local-currency bonds.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁推高美元，交易商为波动做好准备
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言对墨西哥、加拿大和中国征收额外关税后，美元走高，打破了近期对下届政府将采取更有分寸的经济计划的宏观押注。【原文：The dollar advanced after President-elect Donald Trump vowed additional tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China, upending recent macro bets on more measured economic plans from the next administration.】

item.title: 智利能源部长愿意推迟有争议的定价改革
item.description: 智利政府愿意撤销一项会侵蚀可再生能源行业部分利润的措施，但承诺日后将重新审查针对小型发电企业的规定。【原文：Chile’s government is willing to withdraw a measure that would have eaten into profits for a segment of the renewable energy industry, but is pledging to review the rules for small electricity generators at a later date.】

item.title: Venture Global LNG 考虑在路易斯安那州开展第五个出口项目
item.description: 据彭博社看到的一份文件显示，Venture Global LNG 公司正在考虑在美国墨西哥湾沿岸建设第五个项目，这将使该公司有望成为美国最大的燃料出口商。【原文：Venture Global LNG Inc. is considering building a fifth project on the US Gulf Coast that would put it on track to become the nation’s largest exporter of the fuel, according to a document seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 顶级石油交易商称欧佩克+增加供应的空间很小
item.description: 一些世界顶级能源贸易公司认为，欧佩克+在恢复其一直被拒之于市场之外的石油生产能力方面几乎没有选择余地。【原文：OPEC+ has few options when it comes to bringing back the oil production capacity it has been keeping off the market, according to some of the world’s top energy trading houses.】

item.title: 特朗普关税冲击引发特鲁多作战室全员响应
item.description: 周一晚间，加拿大财政部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）在渥太华结束了美国关系特别内阁小组的会议，此时新的危机出现了：唐纳德-特朗普在社交媒体上发出了关税威胁。【原文：Canadian Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland was wrapping up a meeting of a special cabinet group on US relations on Monday evening in Ottawa when a fresh crisis emerged: Donald Trump made a tariff threat on social media.】

item.title: Northvolt 聘请华利安，寻求周转资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，陷入困境的电动汽车电池制造商 Northvolt AB 聘请了财务顾问华利安公司（Houlihan Lokey Inc.【原文：Embattled electric-vehicle battery maker Northvolt AB hired financial adviser Houlihan Lokey Inc. to help it raise funds to turn its business around, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 巴里克黄金公司员工在马里因持续纠纷被捕
item.description: 马里军方控制的政府逮捕了四名巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.【原文：Four Barrick Gold Corp. employees have been arrested by Mali’s military-controlled government as a dispute over its local mining operations escalates.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司准备从 1 月起停止经乌克兰输送天然气
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）正在为明年完全停止经乌克兰输送天然气的情况做准备。【原文：Russia’s Gazprom PJSC is preparing for a scenario where gas flows via Ukraine halt entirely next year.】

item.title: 预算之争使法国债券风险达到欧债危机以来最高点
item.description: 一项衡量法国债券风险的指标升至上次欧元区债务危机期间的水平，因为该国预算问题上的政治僵局有可能导致政府垮台。【原文：A measure of French bond risk rose to levels last seen during the euro area debt crisis, as a political standoff over the country’s budget threatens to bring down the government.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡将货币政策简化为单一基准利率
item.description: 斯里兰卡中央银行表示，将从本周三的下一次更新开始，使用单一基准利率管理货币政策，取代目前的两种利率体系。【原文：Sri Lanka’s central bank said it will start using a single benchmark interest rate to manage monetary policy, starting from its next update on Wednesday, replacing its current system of two rates.】

item.title: 加拿大油田警告特朗普关税将抬高美国汽油价格
item.description: 加拿大石油业强调了其对美出口的经济和安全利益，同时还利用美国候任总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对该国商品征收关税的机会批评总理贾斯汀-特鲁多。【原文：Canada’s oil industry stressed the economic and security benefits of its exports to the US, while also using President Elect Donald Trump’s threat to impose tariffs on the country’s goods as a chance to criticize Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.】

item.title: 加拿大股市因特朗普的关税威胁而下跌
item.description: 周一晚间，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁对加拿大和墨西哥生产的商品征收 25% 的关税，此后工业股领跌多伦多股市。【原文：Industrial stocks led declines in Toronto on Tuesday after US President-elect Donald Trump threatened 25% tariffs on goods produced in Canada and Mexico on Monday night.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁削弱贝森特效应，国债下跌
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对美国贸易伙伴征收额外关税后，美国国债下跌，部分蒸发了斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）被选为该部门主管所带来的收益。【原文：US Treasuries fell after President-elect Donald Trump threatened to slap additional tariffs on US trade partners, partially evaporating the gains spurred by the choice of Scott Bessent to head the department.】

item.title: 赫斯基中游考虑本周出售加元债券
item.description: 据知情人士透露，管道公司赫斯基中游公司（Husky Midstream LP）正在考虑最早于本周出售至少 4 亿加元（2.84 亿美元）的加元债券。【原文：Husky Midstream LP, a pipeline company, is looking at selling at least C$400 million ($284 million) of Canadian dollar bonds as early as this week, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 亿万富翁萨利纳斯的股票陷入离奇停牌
item.description: 里卡多-萨利纳斯-普利戈对争议和危机并不陌生。几十年来，这位企业家与商业伙伴、投资者和监管机构结下了不解之缘，他建立的帝国使他成为墨西哥第三大富豪。【原文：Ricardo Salinas Pliego is no stranger to controversy and crisis. Over decades, the entrepreneur has feuded with business partners, investors and regulators as he built an empire that’s made him Mexico’s third-richest person.】
